document.full_text: former players who did not play long enough to qualify for major league baseball's pension from 1947-80 will receive annual payments up to $10,000 under a new agreement.
document.title: pensionless former players to receive benefits
lines_and_colors: former players who did not play long enough to qualify for major league baseball's pension from 1947-80 will receive annual payments up to $10,000 under a new agreement.
